thought: To craft a quartz_slab, I need to place 3 quartz_blocks, chiseled_quartz_blocks, or quartz_pillars in a row in the crafting grid. I have 2 quartz_pillars in slot 26, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
